57661.en: <voice 00350_00057661><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>It's hopeless... Even though, I promised Grandpa Lapett.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57661.ja:
<voice 00350_00057661><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「困ったわ……。
　ラペットおじいさんと　約束したのに。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57661.ko:
<voice 00350_00057661><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어쩌면 좋지…….
　라펫 할아버지와 약속했는데.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57661.zh-Hans:
<voice 00350_00057661><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>这可怎么办啊……
我都和拉贝特爷爷约好了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57661.zh-Hant:
<voice 00350_00057661><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>這下糟了……
我都和拉貝特爺爺說好了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57663.en:
<voice 00420_00057663><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh, you're travelers, are you. Welcome to the fairy
tale town, Melsandy Village. I'm Airi.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57663.ja:
<voice 00420_00057663><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ　旅の方ですね。
　ようこそ　童話の里　メルサンディ村へ。 
　私は　アイリといいます。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57663.ko:
<voice 00420_00057663><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 아, 여행자님이시군요.
　동화의 마을 메르상디 마을에 어서 오세요.
　저는 애일리라고 한답니다.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57663.zh-Hans:
<voice 00420_00057663><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊，你是旅行者吧。
欢迎来到童话之乡——梅尔桑蒂村。
我叫爱丽。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57663.zh-Hant:
<voice 00420_00057663><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎呀，是旅人啊。
歡迎來到童話之村，梅爾桑蒂村！ 
我叫做愛麗。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57664.en:
<voice 00470_00057664><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...That's right! Maybe someone strong like you can
help me with a problem.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57664.ja:
<voice 00470_00057664><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……そうだわ！ 
　お強そうな　あなたになら　私の悩みを
　解決していただけるかもしれません。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57664.ko:
<voice 00470_00057664><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……맞다! 
　당신처럼 강해 보이는 분이라면 제 고민을
　해결해 주실 수 있을지도 몰라요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57664.zh-Hans:
<voice 00470_00057664><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……对了！
你看上去很强，
也许能解决我的烦恼。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57664.zh-Hant:
<voice 00470_00057664><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……對了！ 
你看起來這麼強，
也許能解決我的煩惱。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57665.en:
<voice 00510_00057665><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I promised to bake bread and deliver it to Grandpa
Lapett doing the picture-show.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57665.ja:
<voice 00510_00057665><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私　紙芝居をしている　ラペットおじいさんに
　パンを焼いて　お届けしますねって
　約束したんです。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57665.ko:
<voice 00510_00057665><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그림 연극을 하시는 라펫 할아버지께 제가
　빵을 구워서 가져다 드리겠다고
　약속했거든요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57665.zh-Hans:
<voice 00510_00057665><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我和画连环画剧的拉贝特爷爷约好了，
要把烤好的面包送给他。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57665.zh-Hant:
<voice 00510_00057665><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我和表演連環畫劇的拉貝特爺爺約好，
要烤好麵包送過去給他。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57666.en:
<voice 00540_00057666><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>But all the wheat stored in the house was stolen by
evil <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57666.ja:
<voice 00540_00057666><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ですが　この家で　たくわえていた小麦を 
　悪い　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>さんたちが
　盗んでいってしまって……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57666.ko:
<voice 00540_00057666><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그런데 이 집에 비축해 두었던 밀을
　못된 <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>들이
　훔쳐가 버려서…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57666.zh-Hans:
<voice 00540_00057666><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>但是可恶的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>们
偷走了家里储存的小麦……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57666.zh-Hant:
<voice 00540_00057666><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>但是家裡儲存的小麥
都被壞心的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>一夥
偷了個精光……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57667.en:
<voice 00580_00057667><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Please, travelers, will you return the wheat back from
the <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57667.ja:
<voice 00580_00057667><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「旅の方　お願いです。 
　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>さんたちから　小麦を
　取り戻してきていただけませんか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57667.ko:
<voice 00580_00057667><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 여행자님, 부탁드릴게요.
　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>들에게서 밀을
　되찾아 와 주실 수 없을까요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57667.zh-Hans:
<voice 00580_00057667><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>旅行者，拜托你了。
可以帮我从<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>们
那里把小麦抢回来吗？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57667.zh-Hant:
<voice 00580_00057667><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>旅人，拜託了！ 
你能從<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>們的手中
奪回小麥嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

クエストを　依頼されました。

퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.

對方提出了任務委託。

57668.en: <voice 00645_00057668><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh! Thank you so much! You're very kind...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57668.ja:
<voice 00645_00057668><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ！　ありがとうございます。 
　お優しいんですね……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57668.ko:
<voice 00645_00057668><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어머나! 감사합니다.
　참 다정하시군요…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57668.zh-Hans:
<voice 00645_00057668><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊！谢谢。
你真是个善良的人……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57668.zh-Hant:
<voice 00645_00057668><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎呀！謝謝。 
你人真好……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

57669.en:
<voice 00820_00057669><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>The <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s that stole the wheat should be at
Melsandy Granary. If you defeat the culprits, they
should drop the wheat.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57669.ja:
<voice 00820_00057669><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「小麦を盗んだ　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>さんたちは
　メルサンディ穀倉帯に　いるはずです。
　犯人をやっつけたら　小麦を落とすでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57669.ko:
<voice 00820_00057669><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 밀을 훔쳐간 <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>들은
　메르상디 곡창 지대에 있을 거예요.
　범인을 해치우면 밀을 떨어뜨리겠죠.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57669.zh-Hans:
<voice 00820_00057669><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>偷小麦的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>们
应该就在梅尔桑蒂谷仓地带。
打倒犯人就会掉落小麦。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57669.zh-Hant:
<voice 00820_00057669><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>那些偷走小麥的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
應該就在梅爾桑蒂穀倉地帶。
只要解決犯人，大概就會掉落小麥吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87195.en:
<voice 00850_00087195><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>If you gather 5 bundles of wheat, that should be enough
to bake some bread, I think.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87195.ja:
<voice 00850_00087195><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「その小麦を　５つほど集めて
　束ねたら　パンを焼くのに
　なんとか足りる量になると　思うんです。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87195.ko:
<voice 00850_00087195><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그 밀을 5개 정도 모아서
　묶으면 빵을 굽기에
　충분한 양이 나올 것 같아요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87195.zh-Hans:
<voice 00850_00087195><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>大概收集５束小麦
并捆在一起的话，
应该差不多够烤一次面包了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87195.zh-Hant:
<voice 00850_00087195><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>大概收集５束小麥
並捆在一起的話，
我想差不多就應該夠烤麵包了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57670.en:
<voice 00880_00057670><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Next—I hate to ask, but—northwest of town, at Melan
waterwheel, if you'd go and mill the wheat for me,
I'd appreciate it. Please, if you would...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57670.ja:
<voice 00880_00057670><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ついでと言ってはなんですが　村の北西の
　メルン水車郷で　小麦をひいてきていただけると
　うれしいです。どうか　お願いしま……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57670.ko:
<voice 00880_00057670><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그 김에 더 부탁드리고 싶은데 마을 서쪽의
　메른 물레방앗골에서 밀을 빻아 와 주시면
　감사하겠어요. 부디 잘 부탁……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57670.zh-Hans:
<voice 00880_00057670><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>说顺便可能有点那什么，
如果你能去村子西北边的梅伦水车乡
把小麦都磨好那就太棒了。拜托……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57670.zh-Hant:
<voice 00880_00057670><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>雖然不能說是順便，如果你能在村莊西北邊的
梅倫水車鄉幫忙磨小麥就太好了。
萬事拜託了……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57671.ja: <voice 01170_00057671><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ゴホッ　ゴホッ。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57671.ko: <voice 01170_00057671><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 콜록, 콜록.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57672.en: <voice 01240_00057672><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...Excuse me. I'll be waiting in my room.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57672.ja:
<voice 01240_00057672><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……ごめんなさい。私は
　お部屋の中で　お待ちしていますね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57672.ko:
<voice 01240_00057672><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……죄송해요. 저는
　방에서 기다리고 있을게요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57672.zh-Hans:
<voice 01240_00057672><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……对不起。那我就回
屋里等你了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57672.zh-Hant:
<voice 01240_00057672><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……對不起，我先去
房間裡等了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57673.en:
<voice 00710_00057673><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh. You're very kind. But it looks like you have a
lot of requests already.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57673.ja:
<voice 00710_00057673><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ。お優しいんですね。 
　でも　頼まれごとが　いっぱいのようですよ。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57673.ko:
<voice 00710_00057673><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어쩜, 다정하기도 하셔라.
　그런데 부탁받은 일이 너무 많으신가 봐요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57673.zh-Hans:
<voice 00710_00057673><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊，你真是个善良的人。
但是你已经接受很多任务了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57673.zh-Hant:
<voice 00710_00057673><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎呀！你人真好。 
但是你承接的委託好像已經滿了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57674.en:
<voice 00930_00057674><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Please, if it's not to much to ask, once you're
available will you hear my request...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57674.ja:
<voice 00930_00057674><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「どうか　ご無理はなさらず
　手が空きましたら　私のお願いを
　聞いていただけると……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57674.ko:
<voice 00930_00057674><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 부디 무리하지 마시고
　여유가 생기셨을 때 제 부탁도
　들어주시면……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57674.zh-Hans:
<voice 00930_00057674><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>请你不要太勉强自己，
等你有空了，
再来接受我的委托吧……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57674.zh-Hant:
<voice 00930_00057674><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>請別勉強，
等你有空了，
希望你可以聽聽我的請託……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57675.ja: <voice 01350_00057675><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ゴホッ　ゴホッ。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57675.ko: <voice 01350_00057675><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 콜록, 콜록.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57676.en:
<voice 01420_00057676><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...Excuse me. I'm going to my room, if you have any
spare time, please come visit me again.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57676.ja:
<voice 01420_00057676><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……ごめんなさい。
　私は　お部屋に入りますので
　また　おヒマな時に　訪ねてきてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57676.ko:
<voice 01420_00057676><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……죄송해요.
　저는 방에 있을 테니
　시간이 있으실 때 다시 와 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57676.zh-Hans:
<voice 01420_00057676><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……对不起。
我先回屋里了，
请你有空的时候再来找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57676.zh-Hant:
<voice 01420_00057676><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……對不起，
我先進屋了，
等你有空時，歡迎你再來。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57677.en: <voice 00750_00057677><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Is that so. It is a lot to ask for...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57677.ja:
<voice 00750_00057677><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「そうですね。
　無理を　言って……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57677.ko:
<voice 00750_00057677><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 아, 네.
　너무 무리한 부탁을……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57677.zh-Hans:
<voice 00750_00057677><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>是啊。
我不该强人所难……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57677.zh-Hant:
<voice 00750_00057677><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我想也是。
不好意思說了些無理的要求……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57678.ja: <voice 00980_00057678><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ゴホッ　ゴホッ。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57678.ko: <voice 00980_00057678><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 콜록, 콜록.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57679.en:
<voice 01060_00057679><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...Excuse me. I'm going to my room, in case you feel
like hearing my request.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57679.ja:
<voice 01060_00057679><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……ごめんなさい。私は
　お部屋に入りますので　もし気が向いたら
　お願いを　聞いてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57679.ko:
<voice 01060_00057679><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……죄송해요. 저는
　방에 있을 테니 혹시 마음이 바뀌시면
　제 부탁을 들어주세요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57679.zh-Hans:
<voice 01060_00057679><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……对不起。
我先回屋里了。
如果你又有兴趣了，再来接受我的委托吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57679.zh-Hant:
<voice 01060_00057679><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……對不起，我先進屋了，
如果你願意幫忙的話，
請隨時告訴我。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57680.en: <voice 00200_00057680><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Grandpa Lapett's picture-show is about to begin!<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57680.ja:
<voice 00200_00057680><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「ラペットじいしゃんの
　紙芝居が　はじまるよう！<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57680.ko:

57690.en:

<voice 01866_00057692><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Thereupon, the gem the mysterious traveler held let

57693.zh-Hans: <voice 01956_00057693><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>让你久等了，小鬼！<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57693.zh-Hant: <voice 01956_00057693><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>讓你久等了，小鬼！<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01966_00057694><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>桑克朗大人揮舞起

<voice 01981_00057695><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>He slayed the terrible hand monster with a "zaku

<voice 01981_00057695><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>将恐怖的手形怪物

<voice 01981_00057695><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>將那些恐怖的手形怪物
三兩下就斬得一乾二淨！
然後，他說出那句關鍵的台詞！<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57696.en:
<voice 02006_00057696><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>No matter what, never give up hope. Melsandy Village,

<voice 02006_00057696><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「どんな時も　希望は捨てんな。

<voice 02006_00057696><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그 어떤 순간에도 희망은 잃지 마라.
　메르상디 마을은 나와 함께 있으니까!<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57696.zh-Hans:
<voice 02006_00057696><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>无论什么时候都不能舍弃希望。
梅尔桑蒂村与我同在！<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57696.zh-Hant:
<voice 02006_00057696><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>無論什麼時候都不能放棄希望。 
梅爾桑蒂村與我同在！<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57697.en:
<voice 02096_00057697><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Thus the hand monster was defeated and sister Mishua
saved.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57697.ja:
<voice 02096_00057697><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「こうして　手の化け物は倒され

57697.ko:
<voice 02096_00057697><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그리하여 손 괴물은 쓰러지고
　누나인 미슈아는 구출되었단다.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57697.zh-Hans:
<voice 02096_00057697><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>就这样手形怪物被打败了，
少年拉斯卡的姐姐米修娅也得救了。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57697.zh-Hant:
<voice 02096_00057697><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>於是，手形怪物被打倒了，
蜜雪雅姊姊也得救了。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57698.en:
<voice 02175_00057698><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>And so ends part 3 of "The Tale of Little Hero
Zankrooone".<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57698.ja:
<voice 02175_00057698><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「しゃて　『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』

57698.ko:
<voice 02175_00057698><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 자, 『작은 영웅 장크로네 이야기』
　제3화, 이것으로 끝~<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57698.zh-Hans:
<voice 02175_00057698><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>《小英雄赞库罗尼的故事》
第三回就到此结束～<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02175_00057698><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>那麼，《小英雄桑克朗的故事》第３集，
就到此結束啦。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57699.en:
<voice 02246_00057699><start_lip_sync n02218 _normal m00001>Wow, even after seeing it so many times "The Tale
of Zankrone" is still interesting, you know.<stop_lip_animation n02218 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57699.ja:
<voice 02246_00057699><start_lip_sync n02218 _normal m00001>「うーん　何度見ても
　ザンクローネの物語は　面白いなあ。<stop_lip_animation n02218 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57699.ko:
<voice 02246_00057699><start_lip_sync n02218 _normal m00001>: 음~ 몇 번을 봐도
　장크로네 이야기는 참 재밌단 말이지.<stop_lip_animation n02218 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57699.zh-Hans:
<voice 02246_00057699><start_lip_sync n02218 _normal m00001>嗯，不管看几次

57699.zh-Hant:

57700.ja:
<voice 02286_00057700><start_lip_sync n02214 _normal m00001>「ねーねー　ラペットじいさん！
　この続きは？　続きはないのっ！？<stop_lip_animation n02214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57700.ko:
<voice 02286_00057700><start_lip_sync n02214 _normal m00001>: 있잖아요~ 라펫 할아버지!
　뒷이야기는요? 뒤에는 더 없어요!?<stop_lip_animation n02214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57700.zh-Hans:
<voice 02286_00057700><start_lip_sync n02214 _normal m00001>拉贝特爷爷！拉贝特爷爷！
后面呢？后面没有了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57700.zh-Hant:
<voice 02286_00057700><start_lip_sync n02214 _normal m00001>拉貝特爺爺！
然後呢？沒有然後了嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n02214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57701.en:
<voice 02351_00057701><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Uuuumm... Sorry, there's nothing more. Well, that's
it for today～.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57701.ja:
<voice 02351_00057701><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「ふーーーむ……。
　しゅまんが　続きはないんだよ。
　さあさ　今日は　これでおしゅまい～。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57701.ko:
<voice 02351_00057701><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 흐으으음…….
　미안하지만 뒷이야기는 없단다.
　자, 오늘은 여기까지~<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57701.zh-Hans:
<voice 02351_00057701><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>嗯……
对不起，后面没有了。
好了，今天就到此为止了～<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57701.zh-Hant:
<voice 02351_00057701><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>嗯……
不好意思啊，沒有然後了。
那麼，今天就說到這裡啦。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000010.ja: <voice 02352_29000010><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「こ……これは……？？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000010.ko: <voice 02352_29000010><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이…… 이건……??<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000011.en: <voice 02353_29000011><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>The exact same fight we went through, wasn't it!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000011.ja:
<voice 02353_29000011><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレたちが　経験した騒動と
　まったく　同じじゃねぇか！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000011.ko:
<voice 02353_29000011><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 우리가 겪은 소동이랑
　완전히 똑같잖아!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000011.zh-Hans:
<voice 02353_29000011><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>这不是和我们经历过的骚动
一模一样吗！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000011.zh-Hant:
<voice 02353_29000011><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>這不是和我們經歷過的騷動
一模一樣嗎！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000012.en: <voice 02354_29000012><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>Raska and... Then me too....... How!?<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000012.ja:
<voice 02354_29000012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ラスカも……そして　私も…………。
　なんで！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000012.ko:
<voice 02354_29000012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 라스카도…… 게다가 나도………….
　대체 어떻게!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000012.zh-Hans:
<voice 02354_29000012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>有拉斯卡……也有我…………
怎么会这样？！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000012.zh-Hant:
<voice 02354_29000012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>有拉斯卡……也有我…………
怎麼會這樣！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000013.en:
<voice 02355_29000013><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>Everything that happened in that village must have
been made up...<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000013.ja:
<voice 02355_29000013><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>「あの村での　出来事は
　全部　作り物だったはず……。<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000013.ko:
<voice 02355_29000013><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>: 그 마을에서 일어난 일은
　전부 가짜였을 텐데…….<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000013.zh-Hans:
<voice 02355_29000013><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>在那个村子发生的事
应该全是假的才对……<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000013.zh-Hant:
<voice 02355_29000013><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>在那個村子發生的事
全都是假的啊……<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000014.en: <voice 02356_29000014><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>How did they turn up in the picture-show!??<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000014.ja:
<voice 02356_29000014><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「なんで　紙芝居に
　出てきてるの！？？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000014.ko:
<voice 02356_29000014><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 왜 그림 연극에
　나오는 거지!??<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000014.zh-Hans:
<voice 02356_29000014><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>为什么会出现在
连环画剧里？？！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000014.zh-Hant:
<voice 02356_29000014><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>為什麼會出現在
連環畫劇裡！？？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57702.en:
<voice 00160_00057702><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh my, travelers, welcome back! Thank you for
delivering the bread to Grandpa Lapett for me, I could
see it from up here.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57702.ja:
<voice 00160_00057702><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ　旅の方　おかえりなさい！
　ラペットおじいさんに　パンを届けてくださるの
　ここから　見えていました。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57702.ko:
<voice 00160_00057702><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어머, 여행자님! 어서 오세요!
　라펫 할아버지께 빵을 전해 주시는 모습이
　여기서도 보였답니다.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57702.zh-Hans:
<voice 00160_00057702><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊，旅行者，你回来了！
我从这里看到你把面包
交给拉贝特爷爷了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57702.zh-Hant:
<voice 00160_00057702><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎呀，旅人，歡迎你回來！
我從這裡看到
你將麵包送給拉貝特爺爺了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57703.en:
<voice 00330_00057703><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Truly, thank you for listening to my strange request.
It's not much, but please take this as thanks.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57703.ja:
<voice 00330_00057703><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「無理なお願いを　聞いてくださって
　本当に　ありがとうございます。
　ささやかですが　こちらは　お礼です。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57703.ko:
<voice 00330_00057703><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 무리한 부탁을 들어주셔서
　정말 감사합니다.
　별건 아니지만 답례를 드릴게요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57703.zh-Hans:
<voice 00330_00057703><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我提出这么无理的请求，你却依然帮了我，
真是非常地感谢。
虽然不是什么好东西，这是我的谢礼。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57703.zh-Hant:
<voice 00330_00057703><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>真的非常感謝你
願意完成我無理的請託。
雖然算不上什麼，但這是謝禮。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

87892.en:
<voice 00430_00087892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Also, my maid, Miss Rudy, thought ahead and reserved
the VIP room at the inn, so please use it.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87892.ja:
<voice 00430_00087892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「それと　お手伝いのルーデさんが
　気を利かせて　村の宿屋さんのビップルームを
　予約してくれたので　お使いくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87892.ko:
<voice 00430_00087892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그리고 도우미인 루데 씨가
　센스 있게 마을 여관의 VIP 룸을
　예약해 주셨으니 사용하시길 바랄게요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87892.zh-Hans:
<voice 00430_00087892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>还有，佣人露黛已经很周到地
事先预约好了村子旅店的贵宾室，
请随意使用。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87892.zh-Hant:
<voice 00430_00087892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>還有，傭人露黛相當伶俐，
她已經先預約好村子旅店的貴賓室，
請儘管使用。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57704.en:
<voice 00446_00057704><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...Travelers. Did Grandpa Lapett speak with you about
something?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57704.ja:
<voice 00446_00057704><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……旅の方。ラペットおじいさんは
　なにか　おっしゃってましたか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57704.ko:
<voice 00446_00057704><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……여행자님, 라펫 할아버지는
　뭐라고 말씀하시던가요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57704.zh-Hans:
<voice 00446_00057704><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……旅行者，拉贝特爷爷
说什么了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57704.zh-Hant:
<voice 00446_00057704><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……旅人啊，拉貝特爺爺
和你說了什麼嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57705.en:
<voice 00583_00057705><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh my, he said he was disappointed that "The Tale of
Zankrone" sequel doesn't exist...?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57705.ja:
<voice 00583_00057705><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ。ザンクローネの物語の続きが
　ないのが　残念だと……？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57705.ko:
<voice 00583_00057705><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어머나. 장크로네 이야기의 뒷부분이
　없어서 아쉬우시다고요……?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57705.zh-Hans:
<voice 00583_00057705><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊。他说赞库罗尼的故事
没有后续非常遗憾啊？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57705.zh-Hant:
<voice 00583_00057705><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎，桑克朗的故事
沒有後續很可惜……？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57706.en: <voice 00617_00057706><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>.......Please wait a moment, ok.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57706.ja: <voice 00617_00057706><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「…………ちょっと　お待ちくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57706.zh-Hans: <voice 00617_00057706><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>…………请稍微等一下。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57707.en:
<voice 00947_00057707><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Grandpa Pampanini was a fairy tale writer who wrote
fairy tales of a hero set in Melsandy Village, the village
that he so cherished.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57707.ja:
<voice 00947_00057707><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「童話作家だった　パンパニーニおじいさまは
　メルサンディ村を　深く愛し
　村を舞台に　英雄の物語を書いたのです。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57707.ko:
<voice 00947_00057707><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 동화 작가였던 팡파니니 할아버님은
　메르상디 마을을 깊이 사랑하셔서
　마을을 무대로 영웅의 이야기를 쓰셨답니다.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57707.zh-Hans:
<voice 00947_00057707><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>曾经是童话作家的庞帕尼涅爷爷
深爱着梅尔桑蒂村，
以村子为舞台写了英雄的故事。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57707.zh-Hant:
<voice 00947_00057707><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>龐帕尼涅爺爺生前是個童話作家，
他以深愛的梅爾桑蒂村為故事背景，
寫下英雄的故事。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57708.en:
<voice 00977_00057708><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>The Little Hero's escapades are fairy tales known by
everyone in the village and, during his life, 3 parts were
published.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57708.ja:
<voice 00977_00057708><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「小さな英雄さんの活躍する　童話は
　村の皆さんに　親しまれ
　生前に　第３話まで　発表されました。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57708.ko:
<voice 00977_00057708><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 작은 영웅님이 활약하는 동화는
　마을 주민들의 사랑을 받으며
　생전에 제3화까지 발표되었죠.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57708.zh-Hans:
<voice 00977_00057708><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>小英雄大显身手的童话
深受村民们的喜爱。
他在生前发表到第三回。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57708.zh-Hant:
<voice 00977_00057708><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>小英雄的大顯身手的童話
很受村裡的大家喜愛，
爺爺生前發表到第３集。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57709.en:
<voice 01047_00057709><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>And so Grandfather left me the fabled "Tale of Little
Hero Zankrone", part 4.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57709.ja:
<voice 01047_00057709><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「そして　これが　おじいさまが遺した
　『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』の
　まぼろしの　４話です。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57709.ko:
<voice 01047_00057709><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그리고 이건 할아버님이 남기신
　『작은 영웅 장크로네 이야기』의
　숨겨진 4화예요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57709.zh-Hans:
<voice 01047_00057709><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>而这个就是爷爷留下的
《小英雄赞库罗尼的故事》
梦幻的第四回。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57709.zh-Hant:
<voice 01047_00057709><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>而這就是爺爺所留下的，
《小英雄桑克朗的故事》
夢幻的第４集。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57710.en:
<voice 01127_00057710><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Although... Because the ending is so sad, I couldn't
show it to anyone.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57710.ja:
<voice 01127_00057710><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「けれど……
　あまりに　悲しい結末が描かれているので
　皆さんには　お見せできなくって。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57710.ko:
<voice 01127_00057710><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 하지만……
　너무나도 슬픈 결말이 그려져 있어서
　다른 분들께는 보여 드릴 수 없어요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57710.zh-Hans:
<voice 01127_00057710><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>但是……
结局实在是太悲惨了，
我没有办法拿给大家看。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57710.zh-Hant:
<voice 01127_00057710><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>不過……
因為結局太過令人悲傷，
所以沒辦法讓大家看。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57711.en: <voice 01157_00057711><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>That's why Grandpa Lapett's dream can't come true...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57711.ja:
<voice 01157_00057711><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「だから　ラペットおじいさんの夢は
　かなえてあげられないんです……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57711.ko:
<voice 01157_00057711><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그래서 라펫 할아버지의 꿈은
　이뤄 드릴 수 없답니다…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57711.zh-Hans:
<voice 01157_00057711><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>所以，我也没有办法为
拉贝特爷爷圆梦。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57711.zh-Hant:
<voice 01157_00057711><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>所以也無法讓
拉貝特爺爺的夢想實現了……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57712.en:
<voice 01247_00057712><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>That's right. I completely forgot to ask you what your
name was. What did you say it was?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57712.ja:
<voice 01247_00057712><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「そうだわ。私ったら　うっかり
　あなたのお名前を　聞き忘れておりました。
　なんと　おっしゃるのですか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57712.ko:
<voice 01247_00057712><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 아, 내 정신 좀 봐.
　당신의 이름도 여쭤 보지 않았네요.
　이름이 뭔가요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57712.zh-Hans:
<voice 01247_00057712><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>对了。我可真是的，
一粗心都忘记问你的名字了。
你叫什么啊？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57712.zh-Hant:
<voice 01247_00057712><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>對了！我也真是的，
竟然忘記問你的名字了。
你叫什麼呢？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57713.en:
<voice 01327_00057713><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...You say you're <pc>? The mysterious traveler
from Grandfather's fairy tale has the same name.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57713.ja:
<voice 01327_00057713><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さんですって？
　おじいさまの　童話に出てくる
　不思議な旅人さんと　同じ名前だわ。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57713.ko:
